short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable to load external script when a page loaded

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on enable to load external script to add extra features. It can load script from remote server. Possible to manage feature for users. The content script will be run at document_start state.
